articles.content: DisplaySpecifications has discovered retail listings for the Samsung S32GB85, also known as the Odyssey Neo G8. Announced in January at CES 2022, the Odyssey Neo G8 was slated for a European launch i… [+1137 chars]

articles.title: Logitech launches new MX Master mouse and mechanical keyboards - XDA Developers
articles.description: Logitech has introduced an improved version of its signature mouse, the MX Master 3S, along with apair of mechnical keyboards for work.
articles.content: Logitech has introduced a few new members of the MX Series of products, including the new MX Master 3S mouse and the MX Mechanical and Mechanical Mini keyboards. The new mouse delivers additional foc… [+3278 chars]
